Interactive Code Editor

Explore code snippets and examples from our tutorials and live streams.

web-tools.js
JavaScript NosytLabs
web-tools.js 
          
            <span class="line-number">1</span>// NosytLabs Web Development Tools
<span class="line-number">2</span>class WebDevTools {
<span class="line-number">3</span>  constructor(projectName) {
<span class="line-number">4</span>    this.projectName = projectName;
<span class="line-number">5</span>    this.version = '1.0.0';
<span class="line-number">6</span>    this.components = [];
<span class="line-number">7</span>  }
<span class="line-number">8</span>
<span class="line-number">9</span>  async initialize() {
<span class="line-number">10</span>    console.log(`Initializing ${this.projectName} tools...`);
<span class="line-number">11</span>    await this.loadComponents();
<span class="line-number">12</span>    this.setupEventListeners();
<span class="line-number">13</span>    console.log(`${this.projectName} tools are ready!`);
<span class="line-number">14</span>  }
<span class="line-number">15</span>
<span class="line-number">16</span>  async loadComponents() {
<span class="line-number">17</span>    try {
<span class="line-number">18</span>      // Load project components
<span class="line-number">19</span>      const response = await fetch('/api/components');
<span class="line-number">20</span>      const componentData = await response.json();
<span class="line-number">21</span>
<span class="line-number">22</span>      console.log('Components loaded successfully');
<span class="line-number">23</span>      return componentData;
<span class="line-number">24</span>    } catch (error) {
<span class="line-number">25</span>      console.error('Error loading components:', error);
<span class="line-number">26</span>      throw new Error('Failed to initialize web components');
<span class="line-number">27</span>    }
<span class="line-number">28</span>  }
<span class="line-number">29</span>
<span class="line-number">30</span>  setupEventListeners() {
<span class="line-number">31</span>    // Listen for user interactions
<span class="line-number">32</span>    document.querySelector('#component-selector')
<span class="line-number">33</span>      .addEventListener('change', this.handleComponentSelection.bind(this));
<span class="line-number">34</span>
<span class="line-number">35</span>    // Setup live preview updates
<span class="line-number">36</span>    document.querySelector('#code-editor')
<span class="line-number">37</span>      .addEventListener('input', this.updatePreview.bind(this));
<span class="line-number">38</span>  }
<span class="line-number">39</span>
<span class="line-number">40</span>  handleComponentSelection(event) {
<span class="line-number">41</span>    const componentId = event.target.value;
<span class="line-number">42</span>    if (!componentId) return;
<span class="line-number">43</span>
<span class="line-number">44</span>    this.loadComponentCode(componentId)
<span class="line-number">45</span>      .then(code => this.displayCode(code))
<span class="line-number">46</span>      .catch(error => {
<span class="line-number">47</span>        console.error('Error loading component:', error);
<span class="line-number">48</span>        this.displayError('Failed to load component. Please try again.');
<span class="line-number">49</span>      });
<span class="line-number">50</span>  }
<span class="line-number">51</span>
<span class="line-number">52</span>  updatePreview(event) {
<span class="line-number">53</span>    // Update live preview with current code
<span class="line-number">54</span>    const code = event.target.value;
<span class="line-number">55</span>    const previewFrame = document.querySelector('#preview-frame');
<span class="line-number">56</span>
<span class="line-number">57</span>    if (previewFrame && previewFrame.contentDocument) {
<span class="line-number">58</span>      previewFrame.contentDocument.body.innerHTML = code;
<span class="line-number">59</span>    }
<span class="line-number">60</span>  }
<span class="line-number">61</span>}
